title: Quote Request Details
description: Captures different details of a quote request process for various types of quotes - including insurance policies, healthcare, manufacturing orders, or high tech orders.

discount.title: Discount
discount.description: Records the discount amount for a quote displayed to a visitor.

premium.title: Premium
premium.description: Records the premium amount for a quote displayed to a visitor.

location.title: Location
location.description: Captures the postal code used for finding retailers near the visitor's location.

personalDetails.title: Personal Details
personalDetails.description: Extension of the Personal Profile data type.

selectedRetailer.title: Selected Retailer
selectedRetailer.description: Captures the selected retailer for a quote request, if applicable.
